content: @Vanessa Candelora @Viet Nguyen Smile CDR would like to register for the 2022-01 Da Vinci Patient Cost Transparency track of the January Connectathon. Smile CDR plans to bring a server participant.
@Joseph Quinn , We are excited to have you and the team at SmileCDR, thank you! @Viet Nguyen , @Larry Decelles @Gary Gryan
